trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There was one other sighting in Wilmington on or around June 22nd 2010
Summary: Family members seen orange sphere out from Carolina Beach.
divs: Sighting Detailsfamily members and i were on vacation on carolina beach. we were on the beach in the evening ,and noticed this orange light out over the ocean.the light would appear ,and go out come back then two or three would appear after approximately twenty minutes the sphere broke off into nine or ten different spheres.the spheres all vanished ,and we didnt see anything else.this event was seen by six adults and four children.we were all amazed and had never seen anything like it.we thought we were the only ones who had seen these lights before a family friend told us about the reports at mufon.we tried to take pictures but no luck
